sections.heading: 1. Introduction
body: Welcome to Cynalitx. We value your privacy and are dedicated to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you visit our website and use our services.

sections.heading: 2. Information We Collect
body: We may collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you register on the website, express an interest in obtaining information about us or our products and services, when you participate in activities on the website, or otherwise when you contact us.

sections.heading: 3. How We Use Your Information
body: We use personal information collected via our website for a variety of business purposes described below. We process your personal information for these purposes in reliance on our legitimate business interests, in order to enter into or perform a contract with you, with your consent, and/or for compliance with our legal obligations.

sections.heading: 4. Contact Us
body: If you have questions or comments about this policy, you may email us at support@cynalitx.com.
